alert.note: Alert for Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 17 at 9:04PM CDT until April 22 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Yockanookany River Near Ofahoma affecting Leake County. Pearl River Near Carthage affecting Leake County. Tuscolameta Creek At Walnut Grove affecting Leake County. Pearl River At Edinburg affecting Leake County. Pearl River Above Philadelphia affecting Neshoba County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River At Edinburg. * WHEN...From late tonight to Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Minor overbank flooding is occurring south of the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 19.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 20.5 feet early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Pearl River Edinburg 20.0 19.4 Sun 7 pm CDT 20.5 20.4 20.3 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Monday morning at 10 AM CDT.
